attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Light sentances do not work for criminals. AsBo's dont work community service does not work. The streets belong to the thugs. Its time to make crime not pay and that means lock them up in tough prisions not holiday camps.longer sentances would reduce crime as it will deter them. so the prison population should go down. Life should mean life not 10 years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
